name: Night of the Spook
description:
Note to WebGL users

If you have a Mac with a Retina display or use Safari, we highly recommend downloading and playing the standalone app!

Changelog

v1.1

  • Fixed issues with end game boss not behaving correctly
  • Added pause menu
  • Fixed issue with lose screen on WebGL
  • Added UI hints for equipment

v1.0

  • Release!
